Judul: SUPERSONIC NOZZLE DESIGN OF SMALL LIQUID ROCKET ENGINE
Abstrak:
The small liquid rocket engine is designed with pressurized feed system configuration. Injectors, combustion chamber, nozzle and system configuration design are the domain of the research. However, the primary focus is the design of  
 

small annular bell shape supersonic nozzle. The design of rocket propulsion technology will always involves nozzle as  
 

one of the important part of the system. To generate the propulsive force, the rocket has to convert the pressure from combustion process inside the combustion chamber into kinetic energy. Therefore, nozzle is designed to convert the combustion energy into kinetic energy. The nozzle is designed to reach supersonic condition at the exhaust.  
 

The axisymmetryc supersonic nozzle region is designed by using method of characteristic (MOC) which implemented in numerical code developed by B.L. Denton. The numerical code is partially adopted and rewritten with addition of subsonic nozzle region calculation. The subsonic nozzle is designed by using McCabe's method. The nozzle designed with assumption of inviscid, irrotational, and isentropic.  
 

The three-dimensional CFD simulation is conducted in order to validate the nozzle design. The performance of the nozzle is checked through processing the results of CFD simulation. The nozzle flow simulated using commercial CFD  
 

software.
Kata Kunci: Axisymmetryc Supersonic Nozzle, Method of Characteristic, Small Rocket, Pressurized Liquid Rocket, Computational Fluid Dynamics
